verses.verse: Woe <S%H1945><s%> to them that are at <S%H7600>ease<s%> in <S%H6726>Zion,<s%> and <S%H982>trust<s%> in the <S%H2022>mountain<s%> of <S%H8111>Samaria,<s%> which are <S%H5344>named<s%> <S%H7225>chief<s%> of the <S%H1471>nations,<s%> to whom the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H935>came!<s%>

Pass <S%H5674><s%> ye unto <S%H3641>Calneh,<s%> and <S%H7200>see;<s%> and from <S%H4480>thence<s%> <S%H8033><s%> <S%H1980>go<s%> ye to <S%H2574>Hamath<s%> the <S%H7227>great:<s%> then go <S%H3381>down<s%> to <S%H1661>Gath<s%> of the <S%H6430>Philistines:<s%> be they <S%H2896>better<s%> <S%H4480>than<s%> <S%H428>these<s%> <S%H4467>kingdoms?<s%> <S%H518>or<s%> their <S%H1366>border<s%> <S%H7227>greater<s%> than your <S%H4480>border?<s%> <S%H1366><s%>
Ye that put far <S%H5077>away<s%> the <S%H7451>evil<s%> <S%H3117>day,<s%> and cause the <S%H7675>seat<s%> of <S%H2555>violence<s%> to come <S%H5066>near;<s%>

That <S%H7901>lie<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> <S%H4296>beds<s%> of <S%H8127>ivory,<s%> and <S%H5628>stretch<s%> themselves <S%H5921>upon<s%> their <S%H6210>couches,<s%> and <S%H398>eat<s%> the <S%H3733>lambs<s%> out of the <S%H4480>flock,<s%> <S%H6629><s%> and the <S%H5695>calves<s%> out of the <S%H4480>midst<s%> <S%H8432><s%> of the <S%H4770>stall;<s%>
That <S%H6527>chant<s%> <S%H5921>to<s%> the <S%H6310>sound<s%> of the <S%H5035>viol,<s%> and <S%H2803>invent<s%> to themselves <S%H3627>instruments<s%> of <S%H7892>music,<s%> like <S%H1732>David;<s%>

That <S%H8354>drink<s%> <S%H3196>wine<s%> in <S%H4219>bowls,<s%> and <S%H4886>anoint<s%> themselves with the <S%H7225>chief<s%> <S%H8081>ointments:<s%> but they are <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H2470>grieved<s%> <S%H5921>for<s%> the <S%H7667>affliction<s%> of <S%H3130>Joseph.<s%>

Therefore <S%H3651><s%> <S%H6258>now<s%> shall they go <S%H1540>captive<s%> with the <S%H7218>first<s%> that go <S%H1540>captive,<s%> and the <S%H4797>banquet<s%> of them that <S%H5628>stretched<s%> themselves shall be <S%H5493>removed.<s%>

The <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>GOD<s%> hath <S%H7650>sworn<s%> by <S%H5315>himself,<s%> <S%H5002>saith<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts,<s%> <S%H595>I<s%> <S%H8374>abhor<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H1347>excellency<s%> of <S%H3290>Jacob,<s%> and <S%H8130>hate<s%> his <S%H759>palaces:<s%> therefore will I deliver <S%H5462>up<s%> the <S%H5892>city<s%> with all that is <S%H4393>therein.<s%>
And it shall come to <S%H1961>pass,<s%> <S%H518>if<s%> there <S%H3498>remain<s%> <S%H6235>ten<s%> <S%H376>men<s%> in <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H1004>house,<s%> that they shall <S%H4191>die.<s%>

And a man's <S%H1730>uncle<s%> shall take him <S%H5375>up,<s%> and he that <S%H5635>burneth<s%> him, to bring <S%H3318>out<s%> the <S%H6106>bones<s%> out <S%H4480>of<s%> the <S%H1004>house,<s%> and shall <S%H559>say<s%> unto him <S%H834>that<s%> is by the <S%H3411>sides<s%> of the <S%H1004>house,<s%> Is there <S%H5750>yet<s%> any <S%H5973>with<s%> thee? and he shall <S%H559>say,<s%> <S%H657>No.<s%> Then shall he <S%H559>say,<s%> Hold thy <S%H2013>tongue:<s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> we may <S%H3808>not<s%> make <S%H2142>mention<s%> of the <S%H8034>name<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD.<s%>

For, <S%H3588><s%> <S%H2009>behold,<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H6680>commandeth,<s%> and he will <S%H5221>smite<s%> the <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H1004>house<s%> with <S%H7447>breaches,<s%> and the <S%H6996>little<s%> <S%H1004>house<s%> with <S%H1233>clefts.<s%>

Shall <S%H5483>horses<s%> <S%H7323>run<s%> upon the <S%H5553>rock?<s%> will one <S%H2790>plow<s%> there with <S%H1241>oxen?<s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> ye have <S%H2015>turned<s%> <S%H4941>judgment<s%> into <S%H7219>gall,<s%> and the <S%H6529>fruit<s%> of <S%H6666>righteousness<s%> into hemlock: <S%H3939><s%>

Ye which <S%H8055>rejoice<s%> in a thing of <S%H1697>naught,<s%> <S%H3808><s%> which <S%H559>say,<s%> Have we <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H3947>taken<s%> to us <S%H7161>horns<s%> by our own <S%H2392>strength?<s%>

But, <S%H3588><s%> <S%H2009>behold,<s%> I will raise <S%H6965>up<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> you a <S%H1471>nation,<s%> O <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> <S%H5002>saith<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts;<s%> and they shall <S%H3905>afflict<s%> you from the entering <S%H4480>in<s%> <S%H935><s%> of <S%H2574>Hemath<s%> <S%H5704>unto<s%> the <S%H5158>river<s%> of the <S%H6160>wilderness.<s%>
